metadata.Title: CVE-2018-4306 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue affected versions prior to iOS 12, tvOS 12, Safari 12, iTunes 12.9for Windows, iCloud for Windows 7.7.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4306` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
